price: 5. de la victoria de Al-lah. Él da la victoria a quien quiere. Y Él es el Poderoso, el Misericordioso.
arabic: بِنَصۡرِ ٱللَّهِۚ يَنصُرُ مَن يَشَآءُۖ وَهُوَ ٱلۡعَزِيزُ ٱلرَّحِيمُ

version.title: Spanish Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish. published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: binaṣri al-lahi yanṣuru man yashāu wahuwa al-ʿazīzu al-raḥīmu
